item.description:
Hey ladies! Happy New Year to all! Hope everyone is enjoying their holidays? I am excited that Dick and Jane will be at The Charlie Horse in a few weeks. For those of you that have not heard of them, they are a fantastic cover band - here is their website where you can find their song list:

http://www.dicknjaneb....

They play great cover tunes of every music genre. If you like to dance, you'll really enjoy the atmosphere. There is a large bar that serves reasonably priced drinks, great apps and snacks. They also have a huge room of arcade games and a billiard room.

The band usually goes on between 9-10pm and they play for a couple of hours.

Hope to gather a great crowd for this Meet Up.

See you all soon!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out an email a few days before to let you all know what I will be wearing (so you can find me:-) and where to meet.
item.name: Dick and Jane at The Charlie Horse!!!!!
